product_name: Pearl Izumi Canyon Plaid Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pearl Izumi Canyon Plaid Bike Shorts are made of a tough, lightweight stretch fabric to give you a comfortable ride no matter how rough the trail gets. ELITE Transfer stretch fabric wicks moisture to the outer surface for fast evaporation and all-day comfort. Pearl Izumi Canyon Plaid Bike Shorts feature a zipper fly with snap closure, an adjustable interior waistband and 1 zippered front pocket. Attached liner shorts are made with stretch-mesh polyester for moisture management; 3D Chamois(R) reduces friction points and enhances cushioning in key areas. Please note: the liner shorts may be removed (carefully) for independent or combined use. Closeout.
